text: IMPORTANT: Power Traingers is not a kid's show! (1/??)
Even if it is a show targetted towards kids, that doesn't mean adults can't watch them too. (6/??)
Overall, Power Traingers is a good series and I would wholeheartedly recommend to it everyone. (14/14)
